actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-602.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6296) to amend and extend certain Federal laws which establish housing and community and neighborhood development and preservation programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6296 (Housing and community development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6296) to amend and extend certain Federal laws which establish housing and community and neighborhood development and preservation programs, and for other purposes.
